00069 template< typename T >
00070 inline const int sign( const T a ) 
00071 { 
00072    return ( x == 0? 0 : (x > 0? 1: -1) );
00073 }
00074 
00076 template< typename T >
00077 inline const T abs( const T a ) 
00078 { 
00079    return ( a >= 0? a : -a );
00080 }
00081 
00083 template < typename T >
00084 inline T frac(const T& f) 
00085 {
00086    return f >= 0. ? f - int(f) : frac(-f); 
00087 }

00090 template < typename T >
00091 inline const T square( const T a ) { return a * a; }

00096 const T& faceforward( const T& N, const T& I)
00097 {
00098    return N;
00099 }

00101 
00103 template < typename T >
00104 T faceforward( const T& N, const T& I, const T& Nref)
00105 {
00106    if (-I % Nref) return N;
00107    else return -N;
00108 }

00118 template< typename T >
00119 inline T linear( const T& a, const T& b, const T& x )
00120 {
00121    if      ( x <= a ) return 0.0f;
00122    else if ( x >= b ) return 1.0f;
00123    else
00124    {
00125       return (x - a) / (b - a);
00126    }
00127 }
00128 
00130 inline miColor linear( const miColor& a, const miColor& b, 
00131                        const miColor& x )
00132 {
00133    miColor c = { linear( a.r, b.g, x.b ),
00134                  linear( a.g, b.g, x.g ),
00135                  linear( a.b, b.b, x.b ),
00136                  linear( a.a, b.a, x.a ) };
00137    return c;
00138 }
00139 
00141 inline miVector linear( const miVector& a, const miVector& b, 
00142                         const miVector& x )
00143 {
00144    miVector c = { linear( a.x, b.x, x.x ),
00145                   linear( a.y, b.y, x.y ),
00146                   linear( a.z, b.z, x.z ) };
00147    return c;
00148 }
00149 
00151 template< typename T >
00152 inline T step( const T& a, const T& b )
00153 {
00154    return ( a < b? (T)0 : (T)1 );
00155 }
00156 
00158 
00160 template< typename T >
00161 inline T smoothstep( const T& a, const T& b, const T& x )
00162 {
00163    if      ( x <= a ) return 0.0f;
00164    else if ( x >= b ) return 1.0f;
00165    else
00166    {
00167       T t = (x - a) / (b - a); 
00168       return t * t * (3.0f - 2.0f * t);
00169    }
00170 }
00171 
00172 
00173 
00175 template< typename T >
00176 inline T silkysmoothstep( const T& a, const T& b, const T& x )
00177 {
00178    if      ( x <= a ) return 0.0f;
00179    else if ( x >= b ) return 1.0f;
00180    else
00181    {
00182       T t = (x - a) / (b - a); 
00183       return t * t * t * (t * (6 * t - 15) + 10);
00184    }
00185 }
00186 
00187 
00189 template< typename T >
00190 inline T pulse( const T& a, const T& b, const T& x )
00191 {
00192    return step(a,x) - step(b, x);
00193 }
00194 
00196 template< typename T >
00197 inline T smoothpulse( const T& a, const T& b, const T& x )
00198 {
00199    return smoothstep(a,x) - smoothstep(b, x);
00200 }
00201 
00203 template< typename T >
00204 inline T smoothpulse( const T& a, const T& b, const T& fuzz, const T& x )
00205 {
00206    return smoothstep(a-fuzz,a,x) - smoothstep(b-fuzz, b, x);
00207 }
00208 
00210 template< typename T >
00211 inline T silkysmoothpulse( const T& a, const T& b, const T& fuzz, const T& x )
00212 {
00213    return silkysmoothstep(a-fuzz,a,x) - silkysmoothstep(b-fuzz,b, x);
00214 }

00220 static const miColor _gridColors[] =
00221 {
00222 { 0.1f, 0.1f, 0.9f, 1.0f },
00223 { 0.9f, 0.9f, 0.1f, 1.0f },
00224 { 0.9f, 0.1f, 0.1f, 1.0f },
00225 { 0.1f, 0.9f, 0.9f, 1.0f },
00226 { 0.1f, 0.9f, 0.1f, 1.0f },
00227 { 0.9f, 0.9f, 0.9f, 1.0f },
00228 { 0.9f, 0.1f, 0.9f, 1.0f },
00229 { 0.1f, 0.5f, 0.9f, 1.0f }
00230 };
00231 
00233 inline miColor randomtriangle( miState* const state )
00234 {
00235    static const short b = sizeof(_gridColors) / sizeof(miColor);
00236    short idx = state->pri_idx % b;
00237    return _gridColors[ idx ];
00238 }
00239 
00240 
00242 inline miColor randomgrid( miState* const state )
00243 {
00244    unsigned int *x = (unsigned int*)&state->pri;
00245    short idx = *x % 7;
00246    return _gridColors[ idx ];
00247 }

00255 template< typename T >
00256 inline T mix( const T& a, const T& b, const miScalar x )
00257 {
00258    if ( x <= 0.0f ) return a;
00259    if ( x >= 1.0f ) return b;
00260    return a + (b - a) * x;
00261 }
00262 
00264 inline unsigned short mix( const unsigned short& a, 
00265                            const unsigned short& b, 
00266                            const miScalar x )
00267 {
00268    if ( x <= 0.0f ) return a;
00269    if ( x >= 1.0f ) return b;
00270    return static_cast<unsigned short>( a + ((int)b - (int)a) * x );
00271 }
00272 
00274 inline unsigned int mix( const unsigned int& a, 
00275                          const unsigned int& b, 
00276                          const miScalar x )
00277 {
00278    if ( x <= 0.0f ) return a;
00279    if ( x >= 1.0f ) return b;
00280    return static_cast<unsigned int>( a + ((int)b - (int)a) * x );
00281 }
00282 
00285 template< typename T >
00286 inline T mix( const T& a, const T& b, const T& x )
00287 {
00288    return a + (b - a) * x;
00289 }

00298 inline float radians( const float deg )
00299 {
00300    return deg * (miScalar)M_PI/180.0f;

00304 inline float degrees( const float rad )
00305 {
00306    return rad * 180.0f/(miScalar) M_PI;

00392 {

00418 inline miVector normalize( const miVector& a )
00419 {
00420    vector b( a );
00421    b.normalizeFast();
00422    return b;

00892 inline vector vpnoise( const miVector2d& a, const miVector2d& p )

01216 
01217 inline float distance(const point& P0, const point& P1)
01218 {
01219         vector v( P1 - P0 );
01220    return v.length();
01221 }
01222 
01223 inline float ptlined(const point& P0, const point& P1, const point& Q)
01224 {
01225     vector V(  Q - P0 );
01226     vector L( P1 - P0 );
01227 
01228     miScalar t = L.length();
01229     
01230     vector Lnorm( L );
01231     Lnorm.normalize();
01232 
01233     miScalar d = Lnorm % V;
01234     if ( d >= 0.0f )
01235     {
01236       if ( d <= 1.0f )
01237       {
01238         V -= Lnorm * d;
01239       }
01240       else
01241       {
01242         V -= L;
01243       }
01244     }
01245     
01246     return V.length();
01247 }
01248 
01249 
01250 inline miScalar depth( const miState* const state, const point& Pin )
01251 {
01252    point P( Pin );
01253    mi_point_to_camera( const_cast< miState* >( state ), &P, &P );
01254    return P.z;
01255 }
01256 
01257 inline matrix inverse( const matrix& m )
01258 {
01259    return m.inverse();
01260 }
01261 
01262 inline miScalar determinant( const matrix& m )
01263 {
01264    return m.det4x4();
01265 }

01267 //
01269 //         Du(), Dv(), Deriv()
01270 //
01271 
01272 
01274 // Derivatives
01276 
01277 
01279 
01281 template< class T >
01282 inline T environment(...)
01283 {
01284    static bool err_environment = true;
01285    if ( err_environment )
01286    {
01287       err_environment = false;
01288       mi_error("Do not use environment() calls as this is silly.");
01289       mi_error("Rely on mi_trace_reflection/refraction to automatically");
01290       mi_error("invoke the environment shader attached to the object or");
01291       mi_error("the camera when there is no hit.");
01292    }
01293    return static_cast<T>(0);
01294 }
01295 
01297 template< class T >
01298 inline T rayinfo(...)
01299 {
01300    static bool err_rayinfo = true;
01301    if ( err_rayinfo )
01302    {
01303       err_rayinfo = false;
01304       mi_error("No need for rayinfo() as all information is already in miState.");
01305       mi_error("Use state->parent and state->child to see previous/next ray");
01306       mi_error("information.");
01307    }
01308    return static_cast<T>(0);
01309 }
